msg: MJAVADOC-148: Support of -top option in standard doclet JDK 6.0

author: sebor
msg: * num_get.cpp (__rw_get_stdio_fmat): Changed the type of the last
argument so std::streamsize to make it possible to pass in and
correctly handle 64-bit values and to aid in silencing 64-bit
conversion warnings at the call site. (Missed this in r574422).

author: jaz
msg: updated code to not try to create multiple role records
